Batcher.title: batcher_batched_transactions
Batcher.description: Counter of batched transactions across all forks

Batcher.title: batcher_last_batched_block
Batcher.description: The last block received by batching

Batcher.title: rejection_ratio
Batcher.description: Ratio of rejected transactions out of all processed, over the last 5 minutes

Batcher.title: reverted_transactions_ratio
Batcher.description: Ratio of reverted transactions out of all processed, over the last 5 minutes

Consensus.title: consensus_block_number
Consensus.description: The block number consensus is working to decide

Consensus.title: consensus_round
Consensus.description: The round of the state machine

Consensus.title: Average consensus round
Consensus.description: Average consensus round (10m)

Consensus.title: consensus_round_above_zero
Consensus.description: The number of times the consensus round has increased above zero

Consensus.title: consensus_max_cached_block_number
Consensus.description: How many blocks after current are cached

Consensus.title: consensus_cached_votes
Consensus.description: How many votes are cached when starting to work on a new block number

Consensus.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_consensus
Consensus.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of consensus

Consensus.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_sync
Consensus.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of sync

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_received
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals received

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_valid_init
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals received with a valid init

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_validated
Consensus.description: The total number of complete, valid proposals received

Consensus.title: consensus_proposals_invalid
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals that failed validation

Consensus.title: consensus_build_proposal_total
Consensus.description: The total number of proposals built

Consensus.title: consensus_build_proposal_failed
Consensus.description: The number of proposals that failed to be built

Consensus.title: consensus_reproposals
Consensus.description: The number of reproposals sent

Consensus.title: consensus_new_value_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has attained a lock on a new value

Consensus.title: consensus_held_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus progressed to a new round while holding a lock

Consensus.title: consensus_timeouts
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has timed out

Consensus.title: consensus_num_batches_in_proposal
Consensus.description: The number of transaction batches in a valid proposal received

Consensus.title: consensus_num_txs_in_proposal
Consensus.description: The total number of individual transactions in a valid proposal received

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_started
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams started

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_evicted
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams evicted due to cache capacity

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_finished
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams finished

Consensus.title: consensus_outbound_stream_started
Consensus.description: The total number of outbound streams started

Consensus.title: consensus_outbound_stream_finished
Consensus.description: The total number of outbound streams finished

Consensus.title: consensus_l2_gas_price
Consensus.description: The L2 gas price calculated in an accepted proposal

Consensus.title: cende_last_prepared_blob_block_number
Consensus.description: The blob block number that cende knows. That means the sequencer can be the proposer only if the current height is greater by one than this value.

Consensus.title: cende_prepare_blob_for_next_height_latency
Consensus.description: The time it takes to prepare the blob for the next height, i.e create the blob object.

Consensus.title: cende_write_prev_height_blob_latency
Consensus.description: Be careful with this metric, if the blob was already written by another request, the latency is much lower since writing to Aerospike is not needed.

Consensus.title: cende_write_blob_success
Consensus.description: The number of successful blob writes to Aerospike

Consensus.title: cende_write_blob_failure
Consensus.description: The number of failed blob writes to Aerospike

Consensus.title: consensus_l1_data_gas_mismatch
Consensus.description: The number of times the L1 data gas in a proposal does not match the value expected by this validator

Consensus.title: consensus_l1_gas_mismatch
Consensus.description: The number of times the L1 gas in a proposal does not match the value expected by this validator

Http Server.title: http_server_transactions_received_rate (TPS)

Http Server.description: Number of faulty added transactions failing on deprecated error

Http Server.title: http_server_add_tx_latency
Http Server.description: Latency of HTTP add_tx endpoint in secs
